entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:39 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
